name: GPT360
description: GPT360, the revolutionary super app revolutionizing web3 marketing and networking. Our innovative features have proven their efficacy in driving user traction, revitalizing existing user communities, and fostering community momentum. At the heart of GPT360 lies our flagship feature, Chaterium Network. Unlike conventional solutions that often lead to inactive user participation, Chaterium Network fosters active community engagement through real-time chat interactions, powered by our advanced AI model. This approach ensures equitable reward distribution and maintains over 90% user activity, effectively enhancing community engagement and sustaining interest.
